meta.description: Real Immunity - 1 Season, 9 Episodes, In Real Immunity, filmmaker Cilla Whatcott seeks to dispel the fear

title: Real Immunity
cleaned_text:
Quest for Real Immunity: The Wisdom of the Body Real immunity lies within. It does not come through a pill or from the end of a needle. Hear from doctors and researchers at the leading edge of the new paradigm.

Quest for Real Immunity: Our Fear of Germs Antibiotics, once a miracle, have now become a nightmare. Have we created a monster? Are we are being harmed by the “war against disease?”

Relinquish fear for knowledge. Learn how to access the inner wisdom you possess to hear that whisper of knowing how to heal yourself.

Learn ways to find your own path to health, including Chinese medicine and homeopathy. Hear about the effective, non-toxic method of immune education available called homeoprophylaxis.

Few people in the United States are familiar with the natural method of immune education called “homeoprophylaxis.” Meet parents who have chosen this road less traveled and are thrilled to tell about it.

What makes people choose the road less traveled? Hear from medical doctors who chose a more natural path after traditional medical school.

Our level of consciousness plays a large part in our natural immunity. Learn a distinct system for assessing the level from which we operate and hear from gifted healers about how they relate to their patients.

Choosing Real Immunity: The Integrity of Our Immunity The consciousness of both parents, plus generations gone before, play a distinct role in the health, immunity, and reality for each of us.

opengraph.title: Real Immunity | Gaia
